## Source: ossf-package-analysis (1fb5c35722207a2ad3fa8b94559fb7fda3fb6c727b9fc45024e06d926df23e34)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'tracking-protection-experiment' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
